David Madrigal

About me

I am a recent graduate of Governors State University with a Bachelors degree in Computer Science. I am very passionate about coding, problem solving and in general all aspects of technology. I deveolped an interest in technology at an early age when I started building my first computer, I learned so much that I have been building and upgrading my own computer ever since. Currently based in the south west suburbs of Chicago.


Aside from coding, Im also into competative gaming, electronics, astronomy, and exploring the outdoors.
